item.description:
Come join us for the Second Annual Liberty School 5K Run/Walk aka Couch to 5K Graduation Race!!!  VERY proud of the runners this session with all of your dedication.

The race begins at 9:30am (posted for 9am to complete the registration pick up, etc).  We will meet near the registration area.

T-Shirts

Free T-Shirts for the first 200 registrants in the 5K!

 

Timing

Electronic Disposable Chip Timing for all Participants

Proceeds

All proceeds will go to fund the activities of the school's PTO

Registration Fee

$20 for Adult, $10 for Children, $50 for Families

**To register**

https://racewire.com/register.php?id=1730

Additional race info:

The route starts at the Liberty School, right out of the driveway onto Proctor Road which merges into Liberty Street.  Follow Liberty Street right onto Peach Street.
Take Peach Street to Kimball. 
Right onto Kimball, right onto Richard.  First left on Richard is Alida Road. 
Follow Alida straight onto Fern Road.  First left onto Evergreen Ave. Follow Evergreen which loops back to Alida/Grove Circle.  Take a right onto Grove Street. Right onto Grove and right onto Liberty Street back to the school.  We had a good turnout last year.
The route sounds confusing but it worked out great.  The runners and walkers don't cross traffic and half the route is in the neighborhood behind the school.  We have two water stops on the route and water/fruit at the finish
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet near the registration area

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Liberty School 5K Run/Walk aka C25K Graduation Race!
